Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Children's Hospital NHS Trust. The Ryegate Children's Centre provides assessment, diagnosis and therapy for children and young people with developmental and neurological problems, eg feeding and nutritional difficulties, degenerative conditions, neuro disabilities, respiratory problems, complex epilepsy. The Respite Unit is for young people aged 3-19 years who are normally known to a Ryegate Consultant and have profound disabilities and associated medical conditions. There are 6 beds. Service for children under 3 years in exceptional circumstances.
